ai-ja404:1.3_0: for a single day or night,
ai-ja404:2.2_0: taking care of the lay life,
ai-ja404:3.1_0: But the true fool is said to be one
ai-ja404:3.3_0: Having gone to the host of mind,
ai-ja404:4.1_0: It’s not good to venerate a fool,
ai-ja404:5.4_0: he’s a frightening over his shoulder.
ai-ja404:6.1_0: But one with ethics and wisdom
ai-ja404:6.2_0: on the side of the pure,
ai-ja404:7.3_0: a wise one judges others from the group,
ai-ja404:7.4_0: or one who gives up sensual desire.
